tool_description: Latest Job and Labor news, information, and discussions trending in todays economy
name: Easy News - Job
title: Easy News - Job

api_list.name: Get All Job And Labor News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back latest news about Labor and Job in todays economy,
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com/jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets latest news for labor and jobs from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/US-News-and-World-Reports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/{siteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-news-job.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
